item.title: This Quick Trick Will Have Your iPhone XR Working Again in Seconds - Even If The Screen Isn't!
item.description: Introduction If you’ve ever had an iPhone XR that stopped working, you know how frustrating it can be. It’s even more frustrating when the screen isn’t working, making it impossible to access the settings and do a hard reset. But don’t despair - there is a quick trick that will have your iPhone XR working again in seconds, even if the screen isn’t! Overview of the Issue When your iPhone XR stops working, it can be difficult to figure out what’s wrong.
